title: Universal Language
tagline: This film longs to hold you.
overview: Winter. Somewhere between Tehran and Winnipeg. Negin and Nazgol find a sum of money frozen deep within the sidewalk ice and try to find a way to get it out. Massoud leads a group of befuddled tourists upon an increasingly-strange walking tour of Winnipeg historic sites. Matthew leaves his job at the Qu√©bec government and embarks upon a mysterious journey to visit his estranged mother.
